FFT delay

Source: R/fft_base.R
fft_delay.Rd

Fast Fourier Transform (FFT): delay per frequencies

Usage

fft_delay(f, freq)

Arguments

f

num. The Fourier coefficients.

freq

num. The harmonics frequencies.

Value

\(D\) array of delays, \(D[n] =\theta_{n}\) for \(n=1,\ldots,\ell-1\).

Examples


fft_rfft(hobo$t_hobo[1:(24 * 5)]) %>%
  fft_delay(fft_freq(24 * 5, 24 * 5))
#>  [1] 24.14719469 14.47134302 -3.55283281 11.00398648 -3.43110014  7.08970405
#>  [7]  6.22069673  1.88578262  6.05778819 -2.44366092  0.35706425  2.74381325
#> [13] -0.94597117  1.87459252 -2.51774660  0.75082050  0.26027646 -2.73256172
#> [19] -1.23145769  0.90435109 -1.24002314 -1.53927390 -2.56697972 -0.59985918
#> [25]  1.12648086 -0.36602758  1.53578613 -1.09241225  1.04251539 -1.19144842
#> [31]  0.09560151 -1.68642874 -1.15322454 -1.36944319 -1.52146330  0.87007200
#> [37] -1.33000464 -0.46681642 -0.79212287  1.15710198  1.11435527 -0.27248418
#> [43] -1.17604731  0.65333589 -0.48414871 -0.77627046  0.82883150  0.34332448
#> [49] -0.10418893 -1.09792407  0.43759461  0.45863187 -0.87417755  0.32473141
#> [55]  0.35461684 -0.75805422  0.47070389  0.01958123 -0.25793917  1.00000000
